setup_script_description: sets focus on and expands the Combobox
task: read information about empty expanded combobox
specific_user_instruction: With focus on the combobox, read information about the combobox.
output_assertions: Name of the combobox ('State') is conveyed
State of the combobox (expanded) is conveyed
The ability to enter or edit text is conveyed
The presence of autocomplete behavior is conveyed
